title: No lock in option
body:
The champion select screen will not show when someone is banning or locking in champion caused me to dodge twice in one day because I couldn't lock in
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
This is usually caused by a bad link to our matchmaking servers, causing your client to fall out of sync with everyone else. You should be able to resolve this issue by following our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to configure your local network settings for League.

If you see this issue pop up again, hit me up.
